data.name: SCP Area 8
data.detailed_description:
SCP Area 8 is an indie, single-player, horror game based on the SCP lore.

You find yourself trapped a deep, underground laboratory. Brave the terrors of the SCPs, and survive.

Some SCPs found in this title:

  • SCP-167 - An endless maze within a 10 m3 cube.
  • SCP-173 - A sculpture constructed from concrete and rebar, with traces of spray paint. Please note: Many people know what SCP-173 looks like, the one found here is a redesign.

The SCP Foundation is a fictitious organization, a titular creative community effort, which studies anomalies. Currently, the SCP wiki has been translated into 11 languages which can be found on individual branches, and also on multi language project nn5n Foundation.

data.short_description: The function of the secret SCP Foundation facilities is to contain and study anomalous objects, but something went wrong.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650M
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 455

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: This game based on SCP Foundation.
